text:
XI. A Thermometrical Account of the Weather, for One Year, beginning September 1753. Kept in Maryland, by Mr. Richard Brooke, Physician and Surgeon in that Province. Communicated by Mr. Henry Baker, F. R. S.

Read Mar. 13,
1755.

**SEPTEMBER, 1753.**

| A.M | Wind and Weather. | P.M. | Wind and Weather. |
|-----|-------------------|------|-------------------|
|     | Clear. N.W. moderate |      | Clear. S.E.       |
| 1   | Flying clouds. S.E. | 79   | D° D°             |

| 12  | D° D°              |      | Intermittent fever and flux |
